original_title: The Real McKenzies: Pissed Tae th' Gills - A Drunken Live Tribute to Robbie Burns
overview: The modern-day Celtic punk band known as the Real McKenzies hail from Vancouver, BC and are deeply rooted in their Scottish heritage. This live performance includes "Stompin Intro," "My Bonnie," "Scots Wha Hae," "Tae The Battle," and more.
title: The Real McKenzies: Pissed Tae th' Gills - A Drunken Live Tribute to Robbie Burns
